title: Strange Glowing Mushroom
summaries: The Strange Glowing Mushroom is a Hardmode pet-summoning item that spawns a miniature Baby Truffle to follow the player around. The Baby Truffle emits a small amount of blue light similar to Glowing Mushrooms. The Strange Glowing Mushroom can be purchased from the Truffle for 45 GC.

statistics.Buy: 45 GC
statistics.Sell: 9 GC
